info.title: API Pokedex
info.description:
This is a simple Pokédex CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) API built with JavaScript and Express.

It allows clients to manage Pokémon entries via RESTful endpoints using standard HTTP methods.

The API includes user authentication with JWT and password hashing using bcryptjs.

It uses CORS middleware to handle cross-origin requests and dotenv for environment variable management.

Data is stored in a SQLite3 database.

Security is enhanced with Helmet and rate limiting using express-rate-limit.

Logging is handled by Winston, and Swagger is integrated for automatic API documentation.

The project includes tests using Mocha, Chai, and Supertest.
